title: Court grants interim bail to two accused in deer hunting case
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 07 (APP):A court on Monday granted interim bail to two accused, nominated in a case pertaining to the deer hunting in Margallah Hills.
Additional District and Sessions Judge Adnan Rasool Lark heard the case.
The court granted interim bail to accused Zain Abbasi and Shabbir Abbasi till July 17. The court sought argumentsÂ from the lawyers of the parties on the next hearing.
The court granted interim bail to the accused against surety bonds worth Rs 20,000.
A case has been registered against the accused in Kohsar police station
